page.title: 09Lord Mayor Treloar College
page.content: { Lord Mayor Treloar College,} in Holybourne, was founded in 1908 by Sir William{Treloar. }It was built as a small boys' school, but has since grown rapidly. It had two houses called pink corridor and blue corridor, but they were both for boys. In 1967 it was changed into a girls' and boys' school, and then the pink corridor was for girls and the blue for boys, but then so many children wanted to go to Treloars that they had to build more houses, so pink corridor and blue corridor went out of use. There has just been another house built called Gloucester House, which was named after the{Duchess of {Gloucester}who}came to open it. The other houses are named after benefactors of the college : Evans, Gavain and Allan.
